name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.transform
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.transform() method of the Canvas 2D API multiplies the current transformation with the matrix described by the arguments of this method. This lets you scale, rotate, translate (move), and skew the context.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.transform' in HTML Living Standard.
